verses.name: Jeremiah 51:7
verses.text: Babylon hath been a golden cup in the Lord’s hand, that made all the earth drunken: the nations have drunken of her wine; therefore the nations are mad.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:8
verses.text: Babylon is suddenly fallen and destroyed: howl for her; take balm for her pain, if so be she may be healed.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:9
verses.text: We would have healed Babylon, but she is not healed: forsake her, and let us go every one into his own country: for her judgment reacheth unto heaven, and is lifted up even to the skies.
